title: In-Game bug
body:
Every time i level up, i got some strange lines on my last 3 item slots.  I can fix it by tabbing out of league and back in.
AND
Sometimes, if i tab out of league, i cant use space to lock the camera on my champ and if i click anywhere i do a ping. (the blue one, not the careful ping.)

I hope this bug will be fixed soon, cause its REALLY annoying.

grabi
